display_long_description:
# NEW! Online Multiplayer!

Play with up to 4 players - online or offline! Shoot mobs and eat candy together... or take it all for yourself!

# Spooky fun for the whole family - any time of the year!

Grab your pickle guns, climb on top of your candy-vacuuming, self-driving chariot, and clean the village of the candy-stealing mobs who have taken control! Take back insane amounts of candy, duck the suspect stuff they throw at you, and battle your way to the final boss!

Halloween Candy Reclaim is your perfect family-friendly, decidedly non-scary (but still spooky!), wacky party game. It's full of pumpkins, ghosts, skeletons, and candy, challenging, and just plain fun - at any time of the year!

# Grab your candy - but don't eat too much of it!

Battle your way through seven levels in five difficulty settings. Collect candy for points and eat it for refilling your health, and build up a shield. But don't trigger a sugar overload - sugar is bad for you!

You will also be rated on accuracy as well as how much candy you manage to eat during each level.

Create local profiles for everyone for a friendly competition! Who scores the most?

# How to play

Play seated or standing - you'll use your controllers to shoot as well as eat the candy. 

The game auto-adjusts to any height of the player.

Five difficulty levels ranging from Piece-Of-Cake (no damage!) to Frustrating (lots of damage!) mean everyone can play, **and finish**, this game.
